# Setup a new user

Open your `.Rprofile` with:

```{r}
usethis::edit_r_profile()
```

Add to `.Rprofile`:

```{r}
Sys.setenv(CKAN_URL="https://data.dpaw.wa.gov.au")
Sys.setenv(CKAN_API_KEY = "your CKAN API key")
```
